function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Growth of IoT and WSN implementation without harmonization of noninteroperable technologies and protocols.","Impact":"Increased risk of data breaches and security vulnerabilities due to lack of standardization.","Mitigation":"Develop and enforce industry-wide standards for IoT communication protocols and data encryption.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure data transmission and storage, and encryption algorithms for data protection.","People":"Users and organizations utilizing IoT devices and sensor networks.","Owner":"Industry organizations, regulatory bodies, and technology developers."},{"Description":"Challenges in managing big data from wireless sensor networks, characterized by volume, velocity, and variety.","Impact":"Overwhelmed data management systems and inability to derive valuable insights from large, complex datasets.","Mitigation":"Invest in advanced data management and analytics tools, implement data filtering and compression techniques, and prioritize relevant data for analysis.","Technologies":"Big data analytics platforms, data compression algorithms, and machine learning algorithms for data analysis.","People":"Data scientists, analysts, and organizations dealing with large datasets from wireless sensor networks.","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies, and data management experts."},{"Description":"Industry-driven development of Business Intelligence and Analytics (BIA) tools without significant academic input.","Impact":"Potential biases and limitations in the application of BIA tools, leading to suboptimal decision-making and operational inefficiencies.","Mitigation":"Collaboration between industry and academia to ensure unbiased and comprehensive development of BIA tools, and ongoing validation and testing of BIA methods.","Technologies":"AI-driven analytics, data validation algorithms, and collaborative platforms for industry-academia engagement.","People":"Businesses relying on BIA tools for decision-making and operational efficiency improvement.","Owner":"Industry and academia collaboration, business leadership, and regulatory bodies."}]}
